item.title: My recent research will be presented at the MIDDLEWARE'19
item.description: A research paper, which I wrote before joining Amazon, will be presented at the Industry session of the ACM/IFIP MIDDLEWARE'19. The title of the paper is “Profiling Dynamic Data Access Patterns with Controlled Overhead and Quality”.

item.title: I will have a talk at the Hotstorage'19
item.description: HotStorage'19 에 제출한 제 최근 연구에 대한 논문이 accept 되어 7월에 해당 워크샵에서 이에 대한 내용을 발표하게 되었습니다. 논문 제목은 “Automating Context Based Access Pattern Hint Injection for System Performance and Swap Storage Durability” 입니다.

item.title: I will have a talk at the FAST'19
item.description: FAST'19 Work-in-progress 세션 에서 현재 진행중인 연구에 대해 발표하게 되었습니다. 발표 제목은 “Automated Data Access Pattern Hint Instrumentation for System Performance and Durability of Swap Storage” 입니다.
